titleText: Microsoft’s Twitch rival Mixer expands to 21 languages
mainText: Microsoft’s Mixer is now available in 21 languages, as the company looks to grow the appeal of its game- focused video-streaming service to users globally. Support for more languages has been the platform’s number one most requested.

titleText: GE, Microsoft to announce deeper industrial internet partnership
mainText: General Electric Co and Microsoft Corp are due to announce a deeper partnership involving GE’s Predix industrial internet platform and Microsoft’s Azure cloud platform, a senior GE executive said. The agreement broadly expands integration.
